item.title: Fixed can now be locked!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:12, topic:251207”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=331513.msg2588102#msg2588102 date=1229625385]

Create the directory Bin.

What do you mean? There is already a Bin Folder in the Java file, Not only that there is a Javac file inside it!

ignore him he dont know what hes talking about here :

@echo off
echo Your server name here
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

Haha, coming from a person that can’t spell coding. That will compile but doesn’t move it to the Bin directory. Now fuck off and learn english.
[/quote]

lol do you even read what the peopel ask ?[/quote]
Can you even spell people?

[quote=“supra s, post:8, topic:251207”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=331513.msg2588082#msg2588082 date=1229624978]
Create the directory Bin.
[/quote]

jeez you realy are stupid english isen’t my main langue end even i know that bin is a map that is used into java files bin doesent belong on that spot of the compiler its just ronge

stop giving peopel ronge information[/quote]
LOL!, Bin is just a directory. It’s no map. -d is a compiler option.

-d Specify where to place generated class files
So -d Bin/ is to put all the class files in a directory called Bin.

item.title: Fixed can now be locked!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Well, first off. You haven’t got a directory called Source.
Second, It can’t find this directory,

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.11\bin\

Try this.

@echo off
title Compiling...
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -d Bin/ *.java
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed can now be locked!
item.dc:creator: @dboy28 dboy28
item.description:
@dboy28 wrote:

The Sustem cannot find the parth specified.
‘“C:\program files\java/jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe”’ is not recognized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue…

But ive check the place where it says, and i CAN get onto Javac![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2008, 12:22:59 pm[/size][hr][quote=“x blitz x, post:3, topic:251207”] @echo off title Compiling... cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*.java pause [/quote]

Tried that, gave the same Error -.- Nice try tho.

Read full topic

item.title: Fixed can now be locked!
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

@echo off
title Compiling...
cd Source
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*.java
pause

Create the DIR Bin before compiling.

Read full topic
